name: foundryvtt-excalidraw-journals
description: Whiteboard in realtime with your players. Freeform drawings and Arrows in a journal entry or actor!

scripts.copy: cp ./templates/excalidraw-actor.hbs dist/ && ./README.md dist/ && cp ./CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp ./LICENSE.md dist/ && cp ./module.json dist/ && cp ./THANKS.txt dist/
scripts.copyWin: copy templates\excalidraw-actor.hbs dist && README.md dist && copy CHANGELOG.md dist && copy LICENSE.md dist && copy module.json dist && copy THANKS.txt dist

author: JeansenVaars (Saif Ellafi)
